llm_res.rule: transfer: Transfers _value amount of tokens to address _to, and MUST fire the Transfer event. The function SHOULD throw if the message caller’s account balance does not have enough tokens to spend.
These functions should return a boolean value indicating success or failure, and callers must handle false returns.
name: Returns the name of the token - e.g. 'MyToken'. OPTIONAL - This method can be used to improve usability, but interfaces and other contracts MUST NOT expect these values to be present.
